Applicable.InformationSecurityManagement: Information security management principles, practices, laws, rules, and regulations
Applicable.ITSystemsAndProcesses: Information technology systems and processes, network infrastructure, data architecture, data processes, and protocols
Applicable.CyberAndCloudSecurity: Cyber and cloud security standard frameworks, architecture, design, operations, controls, technology, solutions, and service orchestration
Applicable.InformationSystemsAuditing: Information systems auditing, monitoring, controlling, and assessment process

Skills.DevelopingAndImplementing: Developing and implementing enterprise governance, risk, and compliance strategy and solutions
Skills.Researching: Researching and locating information related to internal and external organizations using online and other sources
Skills.Troubleshooting: Troubleshooting and operating a computer and various software packages
Skills.DefiningProblems: Defining problems, collecting and analyzing data, establishing facts and drawing valid conclusions
Skills.UsingJudgmentAndIngenuity: Using judgment and ingenuity in maintaining objectives and technical standards
Skills.WorkingWithDiverseBackgrounds: Working with diverse academic, cultural and ethnic backgrounds of community college students and staff

Ability.CommunicateEffectively: Effectively communicate technical issues to diverse audiences, both in writing and verbally
Ability.ApplyRiskBasedApproach: Apply a risk-based approach to planning, executing, and reporting on audit engagements and auditing process
Ability.EvaluateAndUpdate: Evaluate and update and/or revise program materials
Ability.LearnQuickly: Learn quickly and apply knowledge to new situations
Ability.HandleSensitiveAndConfidentialMatters: Handle sensitive and confidential matters, situations, and data
Ability.UnderstandAndFollowInstructions: Understand and follow broad and complex instructions
Ability.InteractPositively: Interact positively with staff, the Board, the public, and regulatory agencies in order to enhance effectiveness and to promote quality service
Ability.ComprehendTechnicalLanguage: Comprehend technical language and to confer, analyze and write in an objective, lucid manner
Ability.WorkIndependently: Work independently and prioritize multiple tasks and adapt to needed changes
Ability.RemainCalmUnderPressure: Remain calm under high pressure/difficult situations
